channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks on Nicolas Blanco
channel.description: Recent content in Recent & Upcoming Talks on Nicolas Blanco

item.title: Bifibrations of polycategories and classical linear logic
item.description: Presenting the theory of bifibration of polycategories and its relation to classical multiplicative linear logic.

item.title: Classical linear logic via bifibrations of polycategories
item.description: Linearly distributives categories correspond to polycategories bifibred over the terminal polycategory.
